dc_title_s: State of New Jersey Board of Commerce and Navigation: Map of waterfront on Arthur Kill or Staten Island Sound at Perth Amboy occupied by the Atlantic Terra Cotta Co.
dc_description_s: Map shows freeholders' Licenses given to Julia Peck - June 6, 1891 and to Perth Amboy Terra Cotta Company - June 6, 1891. Map also shows line for solid filling established by Riparian Commissioners (marked with distances). |Map was enlarged from 1/2500 to 1' = 50" in December 1919.
